Citations
Introduction
Copepods associated with corals and coral reef invertebrates. Descriptions complemented with barcoding. Ecology of the coral reef & sea grass ecosystems, trophic structure using stable isotopes: trophic status of each marine organism/detritus, carbon sources and seasonal characteristics. Food web study on zooplankton community, diurnal changes, material and energy flow. Long-term study at Port Dickson initiated, to collect monthly samples of zooplankton since 2002 till the present.
